## Results for Digit Span 

| **Value** | **Score** |
| :-------- | :-------: |
| Tau-U     | .8065      |
| *z*-Score | 2.931      |
| *p*-value | .0034     | 


## Results for Sentences

| **Value** | **Score** |
| :-------- | :-------: |
| Tau-U     | 1.00      |
| *z*-Score | 3.634      |
| *p*-value | .0003     | 


For both calculations, all participants required a baseline trend correction. The Tau-U values for both calculations generated a significant *p*-value. More importantly, the obtained *Tau* values correspond to either medium to high effect (digit span) or large to strong effect (sentences) when applying the Tau-U benchmarks established by Parker (2011).
